name: Escape Rooms (YahalloGames)
description:
Escape Rooms

You have been locked inside a house and you have to escape from it.

To escape from the house,you have to escape from 5 rooms.

Each room is locked by a 5 number combination lock.

The numbers to the lock are stored inside 5 USBs in each room.

To get the number, you need to answer a quiz or solve a puzzle which is base on French vocabularies.

You can make 10 errors.

If you made more than 10 errors,you will die.

This game is made for the escape game development contest that is held by Institut français de Birmanie.

Special thanks to @Devtrap for making awesome soundtrack ("Where my home is").
